heading: royal flush
subheading: if you needed proof that americans are getting fatter, look no further than the "mayfair majesty," a new, wider toilet seat with just a skosh more room. the seat's maker, bemis manufacturing, said it decided to build the us$50 wide body -- which measures three-quarters of an inch wider than a standard seat -- after receiving numerous customer requests. here, truly, is a throne fit for a king. a king-sized american, that is.
